divs: sighting detailsthe first seighting happened arround about 1\19\08 aproximily eight p.m. till three a.m.. this is a reaccurence and is still happening on almost a daily basices. this object is others as well. as you will see the object moves from left to right sometimes diangle, this object has a lot of speed it is always moves on top of the hillside. the hillside is about 600 yards.during screan,at that time i will stop recoarding, than reposition and start over. i make sure all shots are clear as possible or i wont recoard it.thank you for taking time out i'm so excited to share and have some results of what this could be. around the end of feb. we attempted to contact mufon and accidently contacted jenn stein's group. she refered us to metaphysical historical research group lead by fletcher j. richmand. fletcher and his wife, sandy and an associate sally came to our home to talk to us about the incident. around the same time, we started noticing survailance vehicles outside of our apartment. they inciseted on taking us to have a medical examination done at a local hospital. we followed their adivice. they said we had health problems since we were being treated by alien doctors. we were to go on the ships but were not able to go due to our health problems. being around fletcher, i noticed my brain would feel like it was being scrambled. at that time, we were in fear for our lives. shortly after, we were contacted by jim matthews from mufon. he recieved an e-mail from john vetre who found out about the case from wayne gracy. we met with jim in march. since then, we have tried to file an actual report with mufon and were not able to. we contacted jim again and he advised us to file it through pamufon. that did not work. so, jim is filing this report with our permission.
